parameters: Good morning Ecclesia. Did you sleep well?
Good morning Fleu- I mean, Good morning teacher. Yes, I slept good and I’m ready to get to work today
Good. There is still a lot of work to be done before the Day of Gospel. We should set our minds to make sure everything

parameters.text:
Ecclesia’s face shifted to a more nervous and held back expression.
Fleurdelis was quick to notice it.

parameters: Text = Ecclesia’s face shifted to a more nervous and held …
Don’t be nervous Ecclesia. You will be alright and you will do great as the next great saint. You have been an amazing virtue
since you started here. Just have faith in yourself and in the church, of course!

parameters.text:
Ecclesia cheered up and smiled towards Fleurdelis. 
Nodding her head in agreement.

parameters: Text = Ecclesia cheered up and smiled towards Fleurdelis.  …
You're right. Thank you teacher. I will do my best.
To start off, I want you to meet up with \c[9]Theo\c[0] and \c[11]Adin \c[0]first for your morning practice. We’ll need to be on guard for
You will find \c[9]Theo\c[0] at the training facility and you will find \c[11]Adin\c[0] in his study.
Yes, teacher. I will be on my way then.

parameters.text:
-Meet up with Theo for combat lessons at the training facility.
-Meet up with Adin for Magic lessons at the church library

parameters: Text = -Meet up with Theo for combat lessons at the trainin…
Let me know once you've finished your practice!
Wh-what is that thing in the sky?!
but I have a bad feeling about it...
Wh-what is that thing in the sky?!
From the diamond portal, a burst of smoke was seen trailing
down from the event. The body of an armored dragon appeared
Fleurdelis and Ecclesia charged into battle against the this sudden foe.
There's no mistake! They're planning on some sort of attack...!
To ensure the safety of our people for tomorrow's ceremony, we must prevent another Goblin attack. We will go to investigate
the outskirts of the City and see what we may find...
And... for the Goblin I defeated in the market, what fate shall befall them?
For now, they're to be locked up in the dungeon, God forbid we have not had a reason to use it in quite some time.
It's kept hidden, even I am not supposed to know of it's existance...
Nevermind that.. let us be off then!

parameters.text: Accompany Fleurdelis to the Dogmatika Outskirts outside of the city to investigate.
